title: Wool promotion
creator_credit: Frank Land and Australian Wool Corporation
brief_description: Deals with various activities of the Australian Wool Bureau in promotiong the use of wool both in Australia and through the International Wool Secretariat, in London, Europe and America. Illustrates the use of looms and project materials in schools, the use of instructional films for wool growers; sales promotion in retail stores.
